flavor_text_entries.gold:
The aroma that
rises from its
petals contains a substance that
calms aggressive
feelings.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
MEGANIUM's breath
has the power to
revive dead grass and plants. It can
make them healthy
again.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
Anyone who stands
beside it becomes
refreshed, just as if they were
relaxing in a
sunny forest.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
The fragrance of MEGANIUM’s flower
soothes and calms emotions.
In battle, this POKéMON gives off more of its becalming scent to blunt the
foe’s fighting spirit.
